lead_paragraph: Bank of America really wants to go global. Sallie Krawcheck, the president of the bank’s global wealth and investment management division, said Thursday that it would expand its Merrill Lynch operations outside the United States, as many more of the world’s newly super-rich come from emerging markets, Reuters reports.
